Here's the complete list of built-in scenarios:
1 - South of Tailwood
2 - Through Tailwood Forest
3 - City Ruins
4 - A Gooey Mess
5 - Dead Again
6 - The Accursed Undead
7 - A Flight of Faeries
8 - The Enemy Outpost
9 - Taking the Outpost
10 - Defending the Keep
11 - Tic and Tac
12 - Storming the Fortress
13 - The Castle Interior
14 - Smell of Dead
15 - Battle of the Slime
16 - The Delta
17 - City of Nuthram
18 - Jakarata's Forest
19 - Westwood Forests
20 - Clerics of Westwoods
21 - Carl the Druid
22 - Magi Training Center
23 - Dungeon of the Stars
24 - Westwood Gardens
25 - The Laragen Battlegrounds
30 - Lord Jakarata's Gates
35 - Centweit Manor
36 - An Underground Passage
37 - Dungeon of Centweit Manor
38 - Southeast Castle Corner
39 - Inside Centweit Manor
40 - Centweit Manor
41 - Nylwin Town
42 - A Border Fort
43 - The Foresters
44 - The Foresters
45 - Lake Tacona
80 - (no name - just a tutorial)
81 - (no name - just a tutorial)
82 - (no name - just a tutorial)
83 - (no name - just a tutorial)
84 - (no name - just a tutorial)
88 - (no name)

This is the complete list, considering that it was revealed that all 
the built-in scenarios have a number less than 100.

I noticed that I have never ever visted 88 before considering there is 
no link to it.  Somehow, my latest journey through scenarios missed 
quite a few on this list.

TOm Ricket, whatever happened to #88?  It has an exit pointed back at 
#7.  Why are there gaps in the numbers of built-in scenarios?
